title: Question about changing your language manually
body:
Hi everyone, straight to the point

The languages offered on the eune server are: English, Czech, Greek, Hungarian, Polish, Romanian, but it is possible to manually change the language to Korean or Japanese for example.

If I were to change the language to Korean through the files manually is my account at risk for getting any kind of ban for messing around with these files?

Thanks

{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Currently, each region has their own [supported language](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language).  We don't offer support to manually change languages, though if you do try, be super cautious as it can cause issues.  We won't be able to offer support if it causes you to crash or any tech issue.  Sorry about that!
How come only a select few languages are supported in each region?
no that's not possible , because of localisation problems
